pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, September 13, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

St. Andrews, New Brunswick

Private meetings

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus Retreat.

Closed to media

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability. Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, Minister of Tourism and Associate Minister of Finance Randy Boissonnault, Minister of Health Jean-Yves Duclos, Minister of Housing and Diversity and Inclusion Ahmed Hussen, Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs, Infrastructure and Communities Dominic LeBlanc, and Minister of Official Languages and Minister responsible for the Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency Ginette Petitpas Taylor will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:45 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
